Plot: Come- Travel With me is a memoir. Author is seeking to get readers to wander with him. This book delivers ten chapters. Ten droplets display that. Each droplet will lift you to flourish in the upbringing author encountered. Frist writing experience he had is dreadful. That could have wiped out his desire to pen a book. He hated books a lot. But he conquers that. How he managed that is extremely impressive.. We all hated parents. Author also went through that stage. Why? It is a combo of society, culture and practice they resided and followed in. Tremendous pressure from the society to become something he doesn’t want to. He wished to leave the house. He urged a lot for that. Now years later, Does he repent it… Find out?
